Designer and game nut

Climacons

My first freely available icon collection. The set contains over 70 icons of various weather conditions. The icons became prolific on Dribbble shortly after their release, with hundreds of weather-app designs using them.

The icons have been featured in popular weather apps in both the App Store and Google Play Store, print media, travel websites including Snow Bird and most notably in Honda‚Äôs ‚ÄúThe Endless Road‚Äù interactive YouTube video (the making of which, and more usage of Climacons, can be seen here).
